name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: one language of its creator's choice

traits.Magic Weapons: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.Multiattack: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.
actions.Flail: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Lightning Strike (Recharge 6): The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
